trans-unit.source: Provides constants for compatibility with the shift parameter mask constants in Visual Basic 6.0.
trans-unit.target: 提供常量以与 Visual Basic 6.0 中的 Shift 参数掩码常量保持兼容。

trans-unit.source: In Visual Basic 6.0, shift parameter mask constants were used to represent the state of modifier keys in the `Shift` parameter of various key and mouse event handlers.
trans-unit.target: 在 Visual Basic 6.0 中，shift 参数掩码常量用于表示中修改键状态`Shift`的各种键和鼠标事件处理程序的参数。

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)], the parameters for key and mouse events have changed, and these constants are no longer necessary.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]、 键和鼠标事件的参数已更改，并不再需要这些常量。

trans-unit.source: These constants enable code that has been upgraded from Visual Basic 6.0 to continue to run without additional modification.
trans-unit.target: 这些常数启用已从 Visual Basic 6.0 中继续运行而不进行其他修改升级的代码。

trans-unit.source: Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> 命名空间中的函数和对象是提供给用于将 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] 的工具使用的。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。

trans-unit.source: They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the .NET Framework implementation.
trans-unit.target: 只有当 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 .NET Framework 实现有显著区别时，才必须使用这些函数和对象。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to the Visual Basic 6.0 constant <see langword="vbAltMask" />.
trans-unit.target: 等效于 Visual Basic 6.0 常量 <see langword="vbAltMask" />。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to the Visual Basic 6.0 constant <see langword="vbCtrlMask" />.
trans-unit.target: 等效于 Visual Basic 6.0 常量 <see langword="vbCtrlMask" />。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to the Visual Basic 6.0 constant <see langword="vbShiftMask" />.
trans-unit.target: 等效于 Visual Basic 6.0 常量 <see langword="vbShiftMask" />。
